summary: Build a public-facing application flow: users register/login, fill an applicant details form, upload required documents, then see a confirmation/notification that documents were sent to admin via email/WhatsApp.
architectural_notes: Production deployment/domain must use a valid slug: 5–50 characters, only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
known_issues: Deployment failed due to invalid domain slug: 'public-applicant-onboarding-flow:-internet-identit' contains invalid characters/format and must be 5–50 chars with only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

existing_features.title: Implement public authentication using Internet Identity, including a dedicated Login/Register screen and a protected post-login flow (unauthenticated users are redirected to login when attempting to access protected pages).

Create a consistent multi-step user flow after login with these screens in order: (1) Applicant Details Form, (2) Document Upload, (3) Final Confirmation/Notification; include clear navigation rules so users cannot access later steps without completing earlier steps.
Build the Applicant Details Form page containing fields: Applicant name, Father name, Address, Service opted for; validate required fields and submit the application to the backend.

Build a Document Upload page that allows users to upload one or more files for their submitted application; persist uploaded documents in the backend associated with the authenticated user’s application.

Create a final Confirmation/Notification page shown after document upload that informs the user (in English) that their documents have been submitted and indicates they were “sent to admin email/WhatsApp” as a status message.

Apply a cohesive, distinct visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) suitable for a formal application/submission workflow, ensuring consistency across all pages and states.

Fix the production deployment configuration to use a valid domain slug (5–50 characters; only lowercase/uppercase letters, numbers, and hyphens; no colons or other symbols) instead of the invalid slug 'public-applicant-onboarding-flow:-internet-identit', and deploy the app as a live/public build.

new_feature_requests.summary: Post-login applicant details form (name, father name, address, service opted) with submit action
Document upload page after form submission
Final notification/confirmation screen indicating documents were sent to admin email/WhatsApp

Implement Motoko backend APIs and data model to support: authenticated user application record (applicant details + status), document storage (filename, content type, size, bytes), and retrieval of a user’s current application state to enforce the step flow on the frontend.
Deploy the app as a live/public build (production deployment)

projectName: Public applicant onboarding flow: Internet Identity login, application form, document upload, confirmation
